episodes.title: An Evening with Annie Dawid - After Hours with WriterSanctuary 🥃
episodes.description:
Tonight, I'm joined by Annie Dawid to talk about her long career as a freelancer, her crafts, and some pretty amazing books, especially Paradise Undone, a novel about the Jonestown incident. If you're looking for historical writing, this will be a good show to watch.

Take a look at Paradise Undone for yourself: https://www.amazon.com/Paradise-Undone-Jonestown-Annie-Dawid/dp/1916708021/

My published books are available on Amazon: https://www.amazon.com/author/michaelbrockbank 

Check out the merch! https://writersanctuary-shop.fourthwall.com

#AnnieDawid #Jonestown #AuthorInterview
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For more information, visit: https://writersanctuary.com

My self-publishing insights are available on Substack: https://michaelbrockbank.substack.com/
